Welcome To My Photography & Musical Aritst Page

Capturing a moment of joyful for a life time is my passionate as well as creating, performs, or produce and also instrumentalist and composer.

About Me

Hello everyone, thank you for visiting my page. My name is Daniel. I am a music artist and photographer. I've been doing both music and photography since I was a very young age. I started playing instruments as well as performing as a vocal at the age of 9. As I grow up I would want to be independent artists and record labels so I put all my effort to have the ability to perform or produce music to a hight standard and the ability to connect with audiences and build a fanbase. I am always willing to create a new project to a new style of music. I am in a band call SI-AR "SI-AR BAND" and I have perform in Chin New Year Festival 2023 in Charlotte, NC. I'd always willing to work together with my band and those who want to make music.

My Musical Artist Journey

Music gives a soul to the universe, wings to the mind, flight to the imagination and life to everything.

My Soul
